location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas Smee, Captain of HCC Benares,Bushire, to James Orton Esquire, in Charge of the Bushire Residency

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas Smee, Captain of HCC Benares,Bushire, to James Orton Esquire, in Charge of the Bushire Residency, expecting the arrival of the Vestalin Bushire and acknowledging the receipt of a letter requesting him to take a Wahabee [Wahhabi] envoy from Bushire to El Catif [Al Qatif] and then to Bombay.
